tool_description:
AirNav RadarBox On Demand API enables you to quickly and easily integrate real-time, scheduled or historical flight data into your solutions. Available fields include flight number, scheduled, estimated and actual departure and arrival times, flight parameters such as speed and altitude, aircraft registration/tail-number.

For any questions, requests or suggestions contact our support.
name: Radarbox On-Demand
title: Radarbox On-Demand

api_list.name: getAircraft
api_list.description: Use this endpoint if you are looking for details or statistics for a specific aircraft (find by Mode-S hex code or tail number)

api_list.name: getTaf
api_list.description: TAF (Terminal Aerodrome Forecast) is a weather forecast information service provided by airports to serve the surrounding air traffic. TAF reports are updated several times throughout the day to ensure that pilots have access to the most up-to-date information as possible. You can use this endpoint to get the latest weather information for a specific airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/airports/KJFK/taf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/airports/{icaocode}/taf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getNotams
api_list.description: NOTAMs (NOtice To AirMen) are a way of local aviation authorities alerting pilots of potential hazards. Use this endpoint if you want to see the alerts that are relevant for a specific airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/airspace/KJFK/notams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getMetar
api_list.description: METARs (METeorological Aerodrome Reports) provide a report of the current weather conditions in the vicinity of an aerodrome. Use this endpoint to get the most up-to-date METAR information.

api_list.name: getDatis
api_list.description: ATIS (Automatic Terminal Information Service) is a service that continuously broadcasts aeronautical information around the airport. D-ATIS is the text transcription of the information provided by it. Use this endpoint to find the latest information for a specific airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/airports/KJFK/datis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getNatTracks
api_list.description: The North Atlantic Tracks are high altitude routes across the atlantic between Western Europe and North America. The tracks are updated daily. Use this endpoint to get the most up-to-date tracks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/airspace/natTracks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: searchAircraft
api_list.description: Use this endpoint if you want to list all aircraft of a specific ICAO type or company

api_list.name: searchAirport
api_list.description: Use this endpoint if you are trying to find all airports in a country, city or within a specific region.

api_list.name: getPacTracks
api_list.description: Pacific Organized Track System describes the set of routes across the Pacific between Hawaii or North America and Japan/South-east Asia - updated on a daily basis. Use this endpoint to get the most up-to-date information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/airspace/pacTracks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
